name: CAVE (HypixelHyper)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Escape the Cave!

In this Jump And Run, 1-Bit Pixel Art game you get lost in a cave and try to escape to get back to the Overworld.

Feeling alone? You are no alone!

Meet a friendly ghost that wants to help you escape the cave!

Easy! Or not...

The games difficulty is inspired from Celeste. That means it can get difficult at some points. But remember: Never give up!

Speeeeed

The game is short and perfekt for speedruns, altough it doesnt have a speedrun timer.

And more!

- Secrets to discover

- Trophies to unlock

- A Hard Mode for skilled players

- Original Soundtrack

Note:

This is my second game I ever created and my first Game Jam in which I participate.

Good Luck and have fun!
